entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince Edward (Picton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain and Fog
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 1.3°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
